generated_body: In the article titled "8 Things that Can Happen When You Don't Treat ADHD," the user can expect an informative overview of the potential consequences of untreated Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD). It is likely to discuss various aspects such as academic challenges, difficulties in maintaining relationships, and potential impacts on mental health. The article may also touch upon behavioral issues and the significance of early diagnosis and treatment in mitigating these effects. Overall, it aims to provide a balanced understanding of the seriousness of ADHD when left unaddressed.
